FuncDef: This command enables anti-spoof filtering and optionally changes the anti-spoof matching type for the SAP.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the anti-spoof filtering type for this SAP. Values-ip - Specifies SAP anti-spoof filtering to use only the source IP address in its lookup. If a static host exists on the SAP without an IP address specified, the anti-spoof ip command fails..
